questions.text: Which of the following is not a supported record type for Route53?
True or False. Route53 supports Mail Exchanger (MX) Records
If you would like to point your zone apex at an ELB, which of the following types of records is best to use?
True or False. You cannot register a domain using AWS.
True or False. You can create multiple hosted zones for the same domain name.
You have a hosted zone named hackerrank.co. Which of the following records could not be within that hosted zone?
answers: All of these records could be found within that hosted zone

questions.text: You have Route 53 set up in multiple regions. You would like for your customers to get the quickest response possible. Which of the following policies would you select?

You have a fleet of EC2’s running in Ireland and a fleet of EC2’s running in the United States. Which of the following wouid you use if you want to route 80% of traffic to your fleet in the United States and the other 20% to Ireland?
You are running an application where you would like to serve localized content for some particular countries. Which of the following policies would you use to achieve this?

You are running an application that is unstable. During times when the main site is unavailable, you would like to route the user to a website that is hosted in an S3 bucket. Which of the following policies will allow for you to do this?
You have a weighted policy that with a weight of 6 on US West 2 and a weight of 2 on US East 1. What percentage of the traffic will go to US East 1?
True or False. You can use the Private DNS feature of Route 53 without using a VPC
True or False. Route 53 supports wildcard entries.
